column4: Hi, I am on Ubuntu 10.04. My daughter wants to listen to wretchedradio.com. The listen up tab opens the a new window with the address http://www.wretchedradio.com/mediaplayer.cfm# my computer opens the window and then does nothing, my daughters computer opens a new window and then a message about needing a new plugin, but it can not find it. does anyone have any advice.
I'm trying on windows and it keeps saying me "Install WMP11 plugin
humm do not understand that, but I believe it is a wms file format.
